verses.text: Ach in Diosal, ul colineli. Mamin Jehová, cotanh elanhchamel yic tzin a colani.
Ha heb' snib'an in smilanchamoc, q'uixwokab' el heb', somchajokab' el heb'. Ha heb' snib'ej yak'an chukal t'ayin, b'atokab' heb' elelal yuj q'uixwelal.
Ha heb' tzin b'uchani, aton heb' tz'el stzub' t'ayin, b'atokab' heb' elelal yuj q'uixwelal.
Axo masanil heb' syak'em sb'a t'ayach, tzalajokab' sk'ol heb'. Ha heb' snib'an a colwal, yalokab' heb' to te niwan elk'ochi.
Ha in pax tik jun, ilb'aj in k'ool, cusk'olal waji. Axo swalani: Ach in Diosal, cotanh t'a elanhchamel yic tzin a colani. Ha achnhej tzin a coltaxoni. Cotanh t'a elanhchamel, Mamin Jehová, xin chi.
